list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A large boulder blocked the entrance to the cave.

list_ex_of_english: Large granite glacial boulders unearthed in the mining process.
Adjacent to active border faults to the east and west, sheet- and debris flow-dominated alluvial boulder conglomerates accumulated.
This suggests that the quarrying might have involved a process of splitting large exposed boulders and selecting appropriate blocks.
Quaternary deposits are represented largely by modern cryological regoliths (ranging from coarse boulder to detritus-loamy regoliths).
Their outlines are made of large boulders and their interiors are filled with heat-radiating quartz and quartzite river cobbles.
The breccia contains a variety of boulders, dominated by vesicular basalt and phonolitic lavas.
The underlying rock is massive granite, which has been exposed to form outcrops and boulders throughout the area, with grass and trees between them.
Samples from the normal smooth surface of the gneiss boulder show that the surface has been ground and polished during glacial transportation.
